Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: Published *java sdk 1.0.0-rc1* to maven repository. http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/org/hyperledger/fabric-sdk-java/fabric-sdk-java/..|http://repo1.maven.org/maven2/org/hyperledger/fabric-sdk-java/ release is yet to sync with maven central repository (https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.hyperledger.fabric-sdk-java/fabric-sdk-java)

Action.author: rameshthoomu
Action.body: Maven central repository is synced now with 1.0.0-rc1 release version https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.hyperledger.fabric-sdk-java/fabric-sdk-java |https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.hyperledger.fabric-sdk-java/fabric-sdk-java Closing this issue now.
